name: npmrc-example
description: Dynamically replace variables in `.npmrc` without modifying a .bash_profile

scripts.preinstall: npm run configure-dev && set -a && source ./.env && set +a && npm config set replaceable ${VARIABLE_NAME:-temporary} && npm config get replaceable && ./setup.sh
scripts.postinstall: echo "variable is not accessible without sourcing .env -> ${VARIABLE_NAME}" && echo "npm_config_replaceable is accessible still -> ${npm_config_replaceable}" && npm config get replaceable && rm -rf .npmrc
